metadata.title: Thursday, 4th October, 2012
metadata.session: SECOND SESSION OF THE ELEVENTH ASSEMBLY

questions.minister: Minister of Education, Science, Vocational Training and Early Education when the newly constructed Lufwanyama Boarding High School will be opened to the public.
Minister of Commerce, Trade and Industry
parts: (a)    whether the Government has any plans to revive the pineapple canary plant in Mwinilunga as a way of creating employment for the local community;
(b)    if so, what the plans are;
(c)    whether the Private Public Partnership arrangement is among the plans for reviving the plant; and
(d)    if there are no plans to revive the plant, what the reasons are.

questions.minister: Minister of Local Government and Housing when the Government will establish a water utility company for the Muchinga Province.
Minister of Home Affairs whether the Government has any plans to establish a police post in Kafulafuta Parliamentary Constituency which currently has none.

parts: (a)    whether the Government has any plans to increase the number of cattle in the country to mitigate the shortage of beef; and
(b)    whether the Government has any plans to establish a ranch in each province.
(a)    whether the Government has any plans to construct immigration offices at Nsumbu Border Post in Chimbamilonga Parliamentary Constituency; and
(b)    when more immigration officers will be posted to the Border Post.
(a)    how many patients were treated in Chilubi District by the Northern Province Health Office during its mobile clinic exercise in January, 2012;
(b)    of the patients at (a), how many were:
(i)    operated on; and (ii)    referred to other health facilities and for which illnesses; and
(c)    how much money was spent on the exercise.

parts: (a)    Chilubi;
